sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The tryall of trauell, or, [brace] 1. The wonders in trauell, 2. The worthes of trauell, 3. The way to trauell in three bookes epitemizd / by Baptist Goodall, merchant. Goodall, Baptist.
[80] p.
Printed by Iohn Norton, and are to bee sould by Iames Vpton, at his shop in Paules Church yeard at the signe of the Fox, London : 1630.
In verse. Signatures: A² B-K⁴ L². Title in ornamental border. Includes marginal notes. Formerly STC 12008. Imperfect: pages cropped and print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library. Includes bibliographical references.
=======
